## Matrix4x4.ortho() method

Creates an orthogonal projection matrix from a given frustum.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static ortho(left: number, right: number, bottom: number, top: number, near: number, far: number, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```
